message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you take 40%.
I think we should split this more evenly. I'll take 60%, you take 40%. This way, we both get a good chunk of the money, and we can move on to more important things.
That's just reversing our roles from the last round, Bob. Let's find a more balanced solution.
Okay, Bob, how about a compromise? I'll take a bit less than my initial offer, 55%, and you get 45%. It's a fair deal considering the time pressure.
